title: Track Awesome Devenv Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Devenv (jondot/awesome-devenv) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome tools, resources and workflow tips making an awesome development environment.

items.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 27 - Aug 02, 2020
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jul 27 - Aug 02, 2020
items.content_text:
### Terminal / Extensions

*   [zoxide (⭐28k)](https://github.com/ajeetdsouza/zoxide) - A better way to navigate your filesystem. Written in Rust, cross-shell, and much faster than other autojumpers.

### Workflow / Extensions

*   [Gebug (⭐632)](https://github.com/moshebe/gebug) - A tool that makes debugging of Dockerized Go applications super easy by enabling Debugger and Hot-Reload features, seamlessly.
items.content_html:
Terminal / Extensions

  • zoxide (⭐28k) - A better way to navigate your filesystem. Written in Rust, cross-shell, and much faster than other autojumpers.

Workflow / Extensions

  • Gebug (⭐632) - A tool that makes debugging of Dockerized Go applications super easy by enabling Debugger and Hot-Reload features, seamlessly.

items.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 29 - Aug 04, 2019
items.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Jul 29 - Aug 04, 2019
items.content_text:
### Visual Studio Code

*   [Dev Git Repo (⭐174k)](https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode) - Github code repository for VS Code
*   [Monaco Editor Git Repo (⭐43k)](https://github.com/microsoft/monaco-editor) - Github code repository for underlying browser-based editor

### Visual Studio Code / Extensions

*   [VS Code Extension Marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/search?target=VSCode\&category=All%20categories) - Official website for extensions
*   [Python extension](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-python.python) - Official Python extension
*   [Sync settings](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Shan.code-settings-sync) - Excellent extension for settings and extension sync of your VS code setup
items.content_html:
Visual Studio Code

  • Dev Git Repo (⭐174k) - Github code repository for VS Code
  • Monaco Editor Git Repo (⭐43k) - Github code repository for underlying browser-based editor

Visual Studio Code / Extensions

  • VS Code Extension Marketplace - Official website for extensions
  • Python extension - Official Python extension
  • Sync settings - Excellent extension for settings and extension sync of your VS code setup

items.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Mar 04 - Mar 10, 2019
items.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Mar 04 - Mar 10, 2019
items.content_text:
### Workflow / Extensions

*   [LiveReload](http://livereload.com/) - FS watch and preprocessor as a desktop app for `/OSX/` and `/WIN/` with complementary browser extensions
    *   [guard-livereload (⭐2.1k)](https://github.com/guard/guard-livereload) - Guard plugin compatible with LiveReload's browser extensions
    *   [simplehttp (⭐67)](https://github.com/snwfdhmp/simplehttp) Fastest and simplest way to start serving a local directory over http.
items.content_html:
Workflow / Extensions

  • LiveReload - FS watch and preprocessor as a desktop app for /OSX/ and /WIN/ with complementary browser extensions
    • guard-livereload (⭐2.1k) - Guard plugin compatible with LiveReload's browser extensions
    • simplehttp (⭐67) Fastest and simplest way to start serving a local directory over http.

items.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on May 16 - May 22, 2016
items.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on May 16 - May 22, 2016
items.content_text:
### Atom

*   [atom-beautify (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/Glavin001/atom-beautify) - Beautify HTML (including Handlebars), CSS (including Sass and Less), JavaScript, and much more in Atom.
*   [file-icons (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/DanBrooker/file-icons) - Adds file specific icons to atom for improved visual grepping.
*   [highlight-selected (⭐247)](https://github.com/richrace/highlight-selected) - Double click on a word to highlight it throughout the open file.
*   [minimap (⭐645)](https://github.com/atom-minimap/minimap) - A graphical map (preview) of the full source code.
*   [minimap-git-diff (⭐21)](https://github.com/atom-minimap/minimap-git-diff) - A minimap binding for the Atom git-diff package.
*   [minimap-highlight-selected (⭐41)](https://github.com/atom-minimap/minimap-highlight-selected) - A minimap binding for the highlight-selected package.
*   [atom-project-manager (⭐511)](https://github.com/danielbrodin/atom-project-manager) - Get easy access to all your projects and manage them with project specific settings and options.
*   [atom-tree-view-git-status (⭐24)](https://github.com/subesokun/atom-tree-view-git-status) - Show the Git repository status in the Atom tree-view.
*   [atom-pigments (⭐521)](https://github.com/abe33/atom-pigments) - An Atom package to display colors in project and files.
items.content_html:
Atom

  • atom-beautify (⭐1.5k) - Beautify HTML (including Handlebars), CSS (including Sass and Less), JavaScript, and much more in Atom.
  • file-icons (⭐1.3k) - Adds file specific icons to atom for improved visual grepping.
  • highlight-selected (⭐247) - Double click on a word to highlight it throughout the open file.
  • minimap (⭐645) - A graphical map (preview) of the full source code.
  • minimap-git-diff (⭐21) - A minimap binding for the Atom git-diff package.
  • minimap-highlight-selected (⭐41) - A minimap binding for the highlight-selected package.
  • atom-project-manager (⭐511) - Get easy access to all your projects and manage them with project specific settings and options.
  • atom-tree-view-git-status (⭐24) - Show the Git repository status in the Atom tree-view.
  • atom-pigments (⭐521) - An Atom package to display colors in project and files.

items.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 06 - Jul 12, 2015
items.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on Jul 06 - Jul 12, 2015
items.content_text:
### Dotfiles

*   [dotfiles.github.io](https://dotfiles.github.io/) - Collected dotfile resources. Has sections with dotfile bootstraps and lists of frameworks for various shells and editors.
*   [Paul Miller's (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/paulmillr/dotfiles) - Colourful & robust OS X configuration files and utilities

### Git / Extensions

*   [awesome-github (⭐529)](https://github.com/fffaraz/awesome-github) - Faraz Fallahi maintains a curated list of GitHub & Git resources.

### Presentation / Extensions

*   [bespoke.js (⭐4.8k)](https://github.com/markdalgleish/bespoke.js) - DIY Presentation Micro-Framework
*   [impress.js (⭐38k)](https://github.com/impress/impress.js) - presentation framework based on the power of CSS3 transforms and transitions

### Shell / Extensions

*   [fish-shell (⭐30k)](https://github.com/fish-shell/fish-shell) - The user-friendly command line shell
*   [oh-my-zsh (⭐180k)](https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/) - A community driven framework for managing zsh configuration.
*   [shellcheck (⭐38k)](https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck) - Lint for shell. Will find deprecated and/or dangerous usage in shell scripts
*   [zsh quickstart kit (⭐841)](https://github.com/unixorn/zsh-quickstart-kit) - Quick intro for getting set up with zsh and zgen
items.content_html:
Dotfiles

  • dotfiles.github.io - Collected dotfile resources. Has sections with dotfile bootstraps and lists of frameworks for various shells and editors.
  • Paul Miller's (⭐1.2k) - Colourful & robust OS X configuration files and utilities

Git / Extensions

  • awesome-github (⭐529) - Faraz Fallahi maintains a curated list of GitHub & Git resources.

Presentation / Extensions

  • bespoke.js (⭐4.8k) - DIY Presentation Micro-Framework
  • impress.js (⭐38k) - presentation framework based on the power of CSS3 transforms and transitions

Shell / Extensions

  • fish-shell (⭐30k) - The user-friendly command line shell
  • oh-my-zsh (⭐180k) - A community driven framework for managing zsh configuration.
  • shellcheck (⭐38k) - Lint for shell. Will find deprecated and/or dangerous usage in shell scripts
  • zsh quickstart kit (⭐841) - Quick intro for getting set up with zsh and zgen

items.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 29 - Jul 05, 2015
items.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Jun 29 - Jul 05, 2015
items.content_text:
### Shell / Extensions

*   [awesome-zsh-plugins (⭐17k)](https://github.com/unixorn/awesome-zsh-plugins) - List of zsh plugins usable with [zgen (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/tarjoilija/zgen) and other [oh-my-zsh (⭐180k)](https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/) compatible zsh frameworks
*   [zgen (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/tarjoilija/zgen) - Faster framework for managing your zsh configuration, backward compatible with oh-my-zsh plugins
*   [zsh](http://www.zsh.org/) - A shell designed for interactive use, although it is also a powerful scripting language.
items.content_html:
Shell / Extensions

  • awesome-zsh-plugins (⭐17k) - List of zsh plugins usable with zgen (⭐1.5k) and other oh-my-zsh (⭐180k) compatible zsh frameworks
  • zgen (⭐1.5k) - Faster framework for managing your zsh configuration, backward compatible with oh-my-zsh plugins
  • zsh - A shell designed for interactive use, although it is also a powerful scripting language.

items.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jun 08 - Jun 14, 2015
items.summary: 9 awesome projects updated on Jun 08 - Jun 14, 2015
items.content_text:
### Diagnostics

*   [nmon](http://nmon.sourceforge.net/pmwiki.php)

### Vim

*   [The Ultimate Vim Distribution](http://vim.spf13.com/) - spf13-vim is a distribution of vim plugins and resources for Vim, GVim and MacVim.

### Sublime Text 3

*   [Git Gutter (⭐3.9k)](https://github.com/jisaacks/GitGutter) - display changed/added lines in the margin of the editor window.

### Git / Extensions

*   [gh (⭐718)](https://github.com/jingweno/gh) - Fast GitHub command line client (hub port to Go)
*   [git-extra-commands (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/unixorn/git-extra-commands) - collected git helper scripts
*   [git-extras (⭐18k)](https://github.com/visionmedia/git-extras) - GIT utilities -- repo summary, repl, changelog population, author commit percentages and more
*   [git-it-on (⭐113)](https://github.com/peterhurford/git-it-on.zsh) - ZSH plugin, adds a gitit command that opens the current directory on github in your current branch
*   [git-up (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/aanand/git-up) - a better 'git pull'

### Terminal / Extensions

*   [homebrew](http://brew.sh) - Makes it easy to install open source packages on an `OS X` system with a single command.
items.content_html:
Diagnostics

  • nmon

Vim

  • The Ultimate Vim Distribution - spf13-vim is a distribution of vim plugins and resources for Vim, GVim and MacVim.

Sublime Text 3

  • Git Gutter (⭐3.9k) - display changed/added lines in the margin of the editor window.

Git / Extensions

  • gh (⭐718) - Fast GitHub command line client (hub port to Go)
  • git-extra-commands (⭐1.1k) - collected git helper scripts
  • git-extras (⭐18k) - GIT utilities -- repo summary, repl, changelog population, author commit percentages and more
  • git-it-on (⭐113) - ZSH plugin, adds a gitit command that opens the current directory on github in your current branch
  • git-up (⭐2.6k) - a better 'git pull'

Terminal / Extensions

  • homebrew - Makes it easy to install open source packages on an OS X system with a single command.

items.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 21 - Jul 27, 2014
items.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Jul 21 - Jul 27, 2014
items.content_text:
### Dotfiles

*   [Zach Holman's (⭐7.5k)](https://github.com/holman/dotfiles) - oh-my-zsh, osx, Zsh, vi, Ruby, Git, and more
*   [Mathias Bynens's (⭐31k)](https://github.com/mathiasbynens/dotfiles) - .files, including \~/.osx — sensible hacker defaults for OS X
*   [Thoughtbot's (⭐8.1k)](https://github.com/thoughtbot/dotfiles) - A set of vim, zsh, git, and tmux configuration files

### Presentation / Extensions

*   [reveal.js (⭐69k)](https://github.com/hakimel/reveal.js/) - markdown based presentation on your browser
*   [deck.js (⭐5.4k)](https://github.com/imakewebthings/deck.js) - markdown based presentation on your browser

### Terminal / Extensions

*   [fasd (⭐5.9k)](https://github.com/clvv/fasd) Command-line productivity booster, offers quick access to files and directories.
items.content_html:
Dotfiles

  • Zach Holman's (⭐7.5k) - oh-my-zsh, osx, Zsh, vi, Ruby, Git, and more
  • Mathias Bynens's (⭐31k) - .files, including ~/.osx — sensible hacker defaults for OS X
  • Thoughtbot's (⭐8.1k) - A set of vim, zsh, git, and tmux configuration files

Presentation / Extensions

  • reveal.js (⭐69k) - markdown based presentation on your browser
  • deck.js (⭐5.4k) - markdown based presentation on your browser

Terminal / Extensions

  • fasd (⭐5.9k) Command-line productivity booster, offers quick access to files and directories.

items.title: Awesome Devenv Updates on Jul 14 - Jul 20, 2014
items.summary: 40 awesome projects updated on Jul 14 - Jul 20, 2014
items.content_text:
### Admins

*   [Robomongo](http://robomongo.org/) - a cross platform Admin for MongoDB

### Benchmarking

*   [apachebench (ab)](http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/programs/ab.html)
*   [boom (⭐4.7k)](https://github.com/rakyll/boom)
*   [httperf](http://www.hpl.hp.com/research/linux/httperf/)
*   [phantomas (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/macbre/phantomas) - website perf evaluation tool
*   [siege](http://www.joedog.org/siege-home/)
*   [Vegeta (⭐24k)](https://github.com/tsenart/vegeta)
*   [wrk (⭐39k)](https://github.com/wg/wrk)

### Data

*   [s3cmd (⭐4.7k)](https://github.com/s3tools/s3cmd) - the S3 CLI tool for Amazon

### Diagnostics

*   [glances (⭐29k)](https://github.com/nicolargo/glances)

### Desktop

*   [Alfred](http://www.alfredapp.com/) - OSX productivity app `/OSX/`
*   [hydra (⭐5.2k)](https://github.com/sdegutis/hydra) - script your desktop
    `/OSX/`
*   [Keycastr (⭐475)](https://github.com/sdeken/keycastr) - show your keys while
    presenting/casting `/OSX/`

### Vim

*   [Powerline (⭐15k)](https://github.com/Lokaltog/powerline) - improved status bar for your buffers.
*   [snipmate (⭐2k)](https://github.com/garbas/vim-snipmate) - textual snippets compatiable with Textmate snippets.

### Sublime Text 3

*   [AdvancedNewFile (⭐831)](https://github.com/skuroda/Sublime-AdvancedNewFile) - File creation plugin.
*   [jsFormat (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/jdc0589/JsFormat) - Javascript formatting.
*   [LiveReload](https://github.com/dz0ny/LiveReload-sublimetext2) - LiveReload plugin.
*   [MarkdownEditing (⭐3.2k)](https://github.com/SublimeText-Markdown/MarkdownEditing) - Markdown syntax understanding and good color schemes.
*   [Package Control](https://sublime.wbond.net/installation) - The Sublime Text package manager.
*   [RubyTest (⭐720)](https://github.com/maltize/sublime-text-2-ruby-tests) - Plugin for running Ruby tests.
*   [Side Bar Enhancments (⭐2.2k)](https://github.com/titoBouzout/SideBarEnhancements) - Enhancements to Sublime Text sidebar. Files and folders.
*   [Sublime Git (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/kemayo/sublime-text-git) - Git Integration for Sublime.
*   [Sublime Linter (⭐2k)](https://github.com/SublimeLinter/SublimeLinter3/) - Interactive code linting.
*   [TrailingSpaces (⭐896)](https://github.com/SublimeText/TrailingSpaces) - Highlight trailing spaces and delete them in a flash.

### Git / Extensions

*   [git-sweep (⭐2.6k)](https://github.com/arc90/git-sweep) - safely removes branches that have been merged into the master
*   [hub](https://hub.github.com/) - git CLI wrapper which makes working with GitHub easier
*   [scm\_breeze (⭐0)](https://github.com/ndbroadbent/scm_breeze) Streamline your git workflow

### Presentation / Extensions

*   [remark (⭐13k)](https://github.com/gnab/remark) - markdown based presentation on your browser
*   [vimdeck (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/tybenz/vimdeck) - present inside your Vim

### Text / Extensions

*   [ack (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/petdance/ack2) - the Perl based
    better-than-grep tool.
*   [ag (⭐27k)](https://github.com/ggreer/the_silver_searcher) - A C based code-searching tool similar to ack, but faster
*   [peco (⭐7.8k)](https://github.com/peco/peco) - interactive filtering, like interactive Grep

### Terminal / Extensions

*   [autojump (⭐17k)](https://github.com/joelthelion/autojump) - remembers your
    folders and jump to them based on partial recall (e.g. `j proj` will jump
    to `/home/Users/yourself/projects`.
*   [httpie](http://httpie.org/) A command line HTTP client, a user-friendly cURL replacement.
*   [iTerm2](http://www.iterm2.com/) - a great terminal replacement `/OSX/`
*   [oh-my-zsh (⭐180k)](https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh) - the
    incredible ZSH addon.

### Workflow / Extensions

*   [fswatch (⭐5.3k)](https://github.com/alandipert/fswatch) - a watch tool which
    will emit FS events and you can run commands on demand with. Note -
    `fswatch-run` too.
*   [guard (⭐6.4k)](https://github.com/guard/guard) - FS watch tool with a huge ecosystem of plugins
*   [watchman (⭐13k)](https://github.com/facebook/watchman) - Facebook's better
    `watch` - note it works as a service.
